title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.13 - Parties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.13 - Parties

State Regulations

The term
party
or
parties
as used herein in connection with proceedings under
section 706 of SERA, shall mean any person, persons, entity, or entities
cognizable under SERA, instituting any procedure under SERA, or named as a
respondent or party in interest in any matter filed under SERA, and any other
persons or labor organizations whose interventions have been permitted by the
board or its agents, including but not limited to any hearing officer, administrative law judge, mediator, or special mediator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.13

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
